channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Paramount, Comcast and Netflix Prepare Bids for Warner Bros. Discovery
item.description: Paramount, Comcast and Netflix are preparing bids to buy all or part of Warner Bros. Discovery, a crown jewel of the industry.

item.title: ‘Trust is at an all-time low for both job seekers and recruiters’: Hiring platform CEO says talent acquisition is in an ‘AI doom loop’
item.description: The 2025 Greenhouse AI in Hiring Report found that only 8% of job seekers believe AI algorithms that screen initial applications make hiring fairer.

item.title: One man is responsible for the McDonald’s Dollar Menu, Pizza Hut’s stuffed crust, and Smashburger. Meet Tom Ryan
item.description: Ryan was a hitmaker everywhere he went, from Pizza Hut to Quiznos to McDonald's and beyond.

item.title: Elon Musk revives billionaire beef with Bill Gates, says he better exit his ‘crazy short’ against Tesla soon or else add to his $1.5 billion in losses

item.title: Trust is the missing ingredient in the AI boom
item.description: There is a soft underbelly of the AI boom, a deep sense of unease about its employment effects and a lack of understanding of benefits to the consumer...

item.title: House Democrats Press for Vote to Bar Military Action in Venezuela
item.description: The effort would invoke the War Powers Act, which expedites action on measures limiting the president’s war-making authority. It faces long odds in th...

item.title: Drone tracking startup SkySafe will pay you crypto to buy and install its sensor
item.description: SkySafe is carving out a role as the FlightAware for drones and wants people to contribute to its network by buying a $949 sensor.

item.title: The Trump Family’s Saudi Business Ties, and Hundreds of Gazans on Mystery Flights
item.description: Plus, a vote on the Epstein files.

item.title: At a Shared Symbol of Jihad, the Taliban Defy Their Old Ties With Pakistan
item.description: Afghan officials are lashing out against their former allies in the Pakistani military as hostilities between the two countries intensify.

item.title: The Auto Industry’s Lead Recycling Program is Poisoning People
item.description: We documented the toxic fallout of a green technology.
